channel.title: Multimedia on Tim Goodwin
channel.description: Recent content in Multimedia on Tim Goodwin

item.title: my ad net
item.description: A live updating visualization of every ad server that exchanges data with my apartment’s local area network. A reciprocal tracking of the systems that collect personal information to serve targeted advertisements.

item.title: NYC Music Atlas
item.description: A geospatial guide to the music and visual arts coverage of New York’s Rare Candy Magazine.

item.title: what are you doing
item.description: An instant message love journey involving you and someone else. Please use Chrome for best experience.

item.title: Went to Japan
item.description: A photo essay and JPEG encoding experiment as my final project for the Columbia University Japan Study Tour.
